short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to clear youtube's cache.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When enabled this extension clears YouTube's cache whenever a new video is played. This can improve YouTube's responsiveness especially when using extensions within YouTube (AdBlock).


____

Source code and bug reports can be accessed here:
https://github.com/ghossssst/yt-cache-clear
